mapper.select: SELECT A.QA_ID , A.QA_YM , A.QA_TY_ID , A.QA_TY_L_CD , A.QA_TY_L , A.QA_TY_M_CD , A.QA_TY_M , A.QA_TY_S , A.QA_TY_S_P FROM PLT_PHN_QA_EVAL_SHT A WHERE A.QA_YM = #{QA_YM} AND A.QA_TY_ID = #{QA_TY_ID} ORDER BY A.QA_TY_L_CD, A.QA_TY_M_CD, A.QA_TY_S_P DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLT_PHN_QA_EVAL_SHT ( CUSTCO_ID , QA_ID , QA_YM , QA_TY_ID , QA_TY_L_CD , QA_TY_L , QA_TY_M_CD , QA_TY_M , QA_TY_S , QA_TY_S_P , REG_ID , REG_DTIM , CHNG_ID , CHNG_DTIM , CENT_TY ) VALUES( NULLIF('HKCTALKMNG','') , #{QA_ID} , #{QA_YM} , #{QA_TY_ID} , REPLACE(#{QA_TY_L_CD}, ',' , '/') , REPLACE(#{QA_TY_L}, ',' , '/') , REPLACE(#{QA_TY_M_CD}, ',' , '/') , REPLACE(#{QA_TY_M}, ',' , '/') , #{QA_TY_S} , #{QA_TY_S_P} , #{REG_ID} , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{REG_ID} , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , NULLIF('T','') )

INSERT INTO PLT_PHN_QA_EVAL_SHT ( CUSTCO_ID , QA_ID , QA_YM , QA_TY_ID , QA_TY_L_CD , QA_TY_L , QA_TY_M_CD , QA_TY_M , QA_TY_S , QA_TY_S_P , REG_ID , REG_DTIM , CHNG_ID , CHNG_DTIM , CENT_TY ) SELECT CUSTCO_ID , #{QA_ID} + ROWNUM , #{QA_YM} , #{QA_TY_ID} , QA_TY_L_CD , QA_TY_L , QA_TY_M_CD , QA_TY_M , QA_TY_S , QA_TY_S_P , #{REG_ID} , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{REG_ID} , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , NULLIF('T','') FROM PLT_PHN_QA_EVAL_SHT WHERE QA_YM = #{QA_YM_COPY} AND QA_TY_ID = #{QA_TY_ID}
